home.title: Mystical Tarot Fortune
home.subtitle: Three tarot cards will reveal your past, present, and future.
home.description: Clear your mind and select your cards
home.drawInstruction: Think of your question and click the button below

reading.title: Tarot Reading
reading.pastCardMeaning: The {cardName} from your past whispers to you. The experience of {keywords} has taken root deep in your soul.
reading.presentCardMeaning: The current {cardName} reflects your present situation. You are now in the powerful energy of {keywords}.
reading.futureCardMeaning: The future {cardName} promises you. The energy of {keywords} will brightly illuminate your future.
